skillTree.localised_description: By the eternal will of the Ancients, the forest looks after its own.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 15% during forest battles
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Coeddil has weaved the Winds of Magic since the world was in its infancy.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Even if it takes millennia, every crime committed against the forest shall be accounted for!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: Hate can drive one to make... unusual alliances.

effects.description:
Purchase Cost: -75% for Aspect upgrades
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Once, Coeddil brought life wherever he walked. Now what growth he inspires is sour and rotten.

effects.description:
Enables Awakened Forest attrition
	(enemy armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Taking their cue from the forest itself, the Lord endures and overcomes all.
Using the forest itself as a shield, this Lord is protected by their devotion to Athel Loren.
When to strike, when to block, when to dodge. These are all skills the warriors of Athel Loren must perfect.
There is no greater thrill than to be in the midst of battle, slaughtering in the forest's name.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Power of Darkness"

skillTree.localised_description: With a mighty bellow, the caster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flock of Doom"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Word of Pain"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Word of Pain Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Word of Pain Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs single and multiple units
Strong vs single and multiple units

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Doombolt Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Kadon, a master of forms, was able to shift his shape into anything he chose. This mastery is used to summon a Manticore, as if Kadon himself fights for you.

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -6 for "Transformation of Kadon"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.
The Lord charges their troops to fight for Athel Loren, for their very souls are tethered to its fate.
Lurking amongst Coeddil’s branches and hollows are swarms of chittering Spites, all drawn to his pungent malice.

effects.description:
Cooldown: -30% to Blight of Terrors, Muster of Malevolents, Pageant of Shrikes, and Befuddlement of Mischiefs
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Deep within the blackest forests, Coeddil's followers have awaited his return, their seething rage intensified by every passing year.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Dryad, Tree Kin, Grove Guardians and Treeman units
	(Hero's army)

Passive Ability: Annoyance of Netlings for Dryads units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Pitiful short-lifers, defend your Queen!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +15% when attacking
	(own armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: The lingering corruption of Chaos, or perhaps just the rage of an ancient, incomprehensible mind?

effects.description:
Attrition suffered by defender: +50% when laying siege or encircling
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: For countless years Coeddil has been imprisoned within the Wildwood, held captive by the Elven waystones.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 when fighting against Wood Elves
	(own armies factionwide)
Missile resistance: 25% when fighting against Wood Elves

skillTree.localised_description: The Weave is the only true companion for an eternal being.

effects.description:
Enemy spell resistance: -10%
	(enemy armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: For countless offenses, intrusions, and violations, atonement must be made.
You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! It’s just going to make me mad.
Onwards! To war, and victory!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: True experience is born only on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +1% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +3% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +5% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +1 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: Allows the unit to attack and destroy walls in melee.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Coeddil's curdled heart attracts the most malignant and terrifying spirits.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
